short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates Fake express routes for your website, for functional testing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fake routes help you create express routes which return hadcorded jsons.
  This will prevent the server from hitting the database.
  Navigate your website with this popup on.
  Any requests generating a json, response will appear in this popup.
  After you are done you can click on DOWNLOAD ROUTES.
  This will generate a express routes files.  
  Now create a express project and add the routes in it.
  Also add the dist folder from your project which you are trying to test.
